verses.verse: The priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, and all the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, shall have no part <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with Israel <S%H3478><s%>: they shall eat <S%H398><s%> the offerings <S%H801><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>, and his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

Therefore shall they have no inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> their brothers <S%H251><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as he has said unto them <S%H1696><s%>.

And this shall be the priest <S%H3548><s%>'s due <S%H4941><s%> from the people <S%H5971><s%>, from them that offer <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>, whether it be ox <S%H7794><s%> or sheep <S%H7716><s%>; and they shall give <S%H5414><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%> the shoulder <S%H2220><s%>, and the two cheeks <S%H3895><s%>, and the maw <S%H6896><s%>.

The firstfruit <S%H7225><s%> also of your corn <S%H1715><s%>, of your wine <S%H8492><s%>, and of your oil <S%H3323><s%>, and the first <S%H7225><s%> of the fleece <S%H1488><s%> of your sheep <S%H6629><s%>, shall you give him <S%H5414><s%>.

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> him out of all your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, to stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, him and his sons <S%H1121><s%> for ever <S%H3117><s%>.

And if a Levite <S%H3881><s%> come <S%H935><s%> from any <S%H259><s%> of your gates <S%H8179><s%> out of all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, where he stayed <S%H1481><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> with all the desire <S%H185><s%> of his mind <S%H5315><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>;

Then he shall minister <S%H8334><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%>, as all his brothers <S%H251><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> do <S%H5975><s%>, which stand there before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
They shall have like portions <S%H2506><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%>, beside that which comes of the sale <S%H4465><s%> of his patrimony <S%H1><s%>.

When you are come <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H3925><s%>, you shall not learn to do <S%H6213><s%> after the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of those nations <S%H1471><s%>.

There shall not be found <S%H4672><s%> among you any one that makes his son <S%H1121><s%> or his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire <S%H784><s%>, or that uses <S%H7080><s%> divination <S%H7081><s%>, or an observer of times <S%H6049><s%>, or an enchanter <S%H5172><s%>, or a witch <S%H3784><s%>,
Or a charmer <S%H2266><s%>, or a consulter <S%H7592><s%> with familiar spirits <S%H178><s%>, or a wizard <S%H3049><s%>, or a necromancer <S%H1875><s%>.

For all that do <S%H6213><s%> these things are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and because <S%H1558><s%> of these abominations <S%H8441><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> does drive them out <S%H3423><s%> from before you <S%H6440><s%>.
You shall be perfect <S%H8549><s%> with the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

For these nations <S%H1471><s%>, which you shall possess <S%H3423><s%>, listened <S%H8085><s%> unto observers of times <S%H6049><s%>, and unto diviners <S%H7080><s%>: but as for you <S%H3068><s%>, the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> has not allowed you so to do <S%H5414><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will raise up <S%H6965><s%> unto you a Prophet <S%H5030><s%> from the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you <S%H251><s%>, of your brothers, like unto me <S%H8085><s%>; unto him you shall listen;

According to all that you desired <S%H7592><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Let me not hear <S%H8085><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, neither let me see <S%H7200><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> any more <S%H4191><s%>, that I die not.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H3190><s%>, They have well spoken that which they have spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

I will raise them up <S%H6965><s%> a Prophet <S%H5030><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> their brothers <S%H251><s%>, like unto you <S%H5414><s%>, and will put my words <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth <S%H6310><s%>; and he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto them all that I shall command him <S%H6680><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H376><s%>, that whoever will not listen <S%H8085><s%> unto my words <S%H1697><s%> which he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> in my name <S%H8034><s%>, I will require it of him <S%H1875><s%>.

But the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, which shall presume <S%H2102><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in my name <S%H8034><s%>, which I have not commanded <S%H6680><s%> him to speak <S%H1696><s%>, or that shall speak <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, even that prophet <S%H5030><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%>.
And if you say <S%H559><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%>, How shall we know <S%H3045><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not spoken <S%H1696><s%>?

When a prophet <S%H5030><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, if the thing <S%H1697><s%> follow not <S%H935><s%>, nor come to pass, that is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not spoken <S%H1696><s%>, but the prophet <S%H5030><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> it presumptuously <S%H2087><s%>: you shall not be afraid of him <S%H1481><s%>.
